event.title: purchased land near Alden's Island in 1834

data.event: Thomas Cox purchased land near Alden's Island in 1834 and built a sawmill, corn cracker, gristmill, and a carding machine.
The bus station was demolished in 2011.

event.title: was used as a natural mill race during the early years

data.event: This island divides the river into a large channel and a smaller one which was used as a natural mill race during the early years of the city.
